attributes.action: give Local Governments a higher budget to improve the environment within housing estates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This budget would bring the immediate environment ie: Council Housing Estates, up to the same high standard as the Decency Standard for Council Houses.  There isn't much point improving the houses without improving the environment.  What good is a 'Palace in the middle of a Pigsty'.  The existing budget is not high enough to implement the improvements needed, many of these areas have not been maintained for over 40 years.  (Radburn Estate, New Rossington, Doncaster).
